Restaurants.GET /restaurants: Get all restaurants with optional filters (city, cuisine)
Restaurants.GET /restaurants/:id: Get details of a single restaurant

Menus.GET /restaurants/:id/menu: Get the menu of a restaurant
Menus.POST /restaurants/:id/menu: Add a new item to the menu (Owner only)

Reservations.GET /reservations: Get reservations for the current user

Reviews.POST /restaurants/:id/reviews: Add a review for a restaurant
